interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sweat Cosmetics Foundation Powder Jar SPF 30 Water + Sweat Resistant (Shade 100: light)
Review Date: 2021/03/14
Store: SWEAT FOR ACTIVE BEAUTY
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Package Information': 'Jar', 'Brand': 'SWEAT FOR ACTIVE BEAUTY', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.8 x 2.8 x 1.4 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
Review Text: This powder is nice enough, but it doesn't blow me away so much that I can justify spending almost $50 for a jar of powder. I have dry skin and powder often makes me look cakey, this sits on my skin nicely and doesn't look too thick or powdery. I would say this has light to medium coverage. The shade I received is 100 light, it pulls too yellow/orange on me, I wish it had a more neutral undertone. I like that it has SPF 30 and is water/sweat resistant, I will probably get a lot more use out of this in the summer than in the winter. Overall, this is a decent product but I have several other loose powder foundations that I like just as much that are a fraction of this price.
Review Title: Expensive powder
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
N3 No Name Necessary Mattifying Shine and Oil Control Long Lasting Anti-aging Makeup Setting Spray (200ml)
No Name Necessary
{'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
This spray feels slightly like hairspray when you spritz it on. It helps makeup last all day and stay matte. I personally like a dewy finish so I spray this first for longevity, then when it dries I’ll spray a little dewy spray. Love the combo! Comes in a huge bottle that will last forever.
Good spray for oily skin
Catrice | SUNGASM Luminizing Bronzer 01 | For A Sun-Kissed Shimmery Finish | Highly Pigmented & Blendable | Vegan, Paraben Free, Oil Free | Cruelty Free
Catrice
{'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Brand': 'Catrice', 'Color': 'C01 Golden Ecstasy', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Product Dimensions': '2.72 x 2.72 x 0.51 inches; 1.27 Ounces'}
This bronzer is really pretty, it's not matte but not glittery. It has the perfect amount of shimmer/sheen that makes your skin look healthy and glowy. Perfect for summer. It blends out beautifully on my skin and looks like I have a natural tan. I have fair skin and the 01 shade doesn't pull too orange or too red on me.
So beautiful!
Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz
Bouquet Garni
{'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'}
This body wash lathers nicely and has a pleasant, musky scent. I find I need about 3-4 pumps to wash my whole body. It came in a really nice box that would make a cute gift. I wish it had a little bit more vanilla scent to it.
Lathers nice!
Sweat Cosmetics Foundation Powder Jar SPF 30 Water + Sweat Resistant (Shade 100: light)
SWEAT FOR ACTIVE BEAUTY

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Makeup Preferences**: Prioritizes long-lasting solutions with a focus on controlling shine and oil while valuing products that provide a healthy glow. Recently explored a foundation powder that offers SPF and water/sweat resistance, emphasizing the need for functional products for active situations.
  
- **Skin Type**: Likely has oily skin but also experiences periods of dryness and sensitivities, as indicated by the recent interaction. Shows a preference for products that avoid cakiness, favoring formulations that sit nicely on the skin.

- **Finish Preference**: Enjoys a dewy finish and products that impart a sun-kissed effect, demonstrating versatility in achieving different looks based on the environment and season.

- **Body Care Preferences**: Engages with effective cleansing products that provide pleasant fragrances, leaning towards gentle formulations with subtle sweetness in scents.

- **Product Packaging**: Prefers larger sizes for longevity and cost-effectiveness, though recent experiences illustrate a consideration of value for performance.

- **Review Behavior**: Offers balanced and pragmatic reviews, indicating a discerning approach to evaluating products based on quality and effectiveness. This user recently highlighted a desire for neutral undertones in products while balancing the price against performance.

- **Usage Technique**: Utilizes a mix of products and blends well, indicating readiness to experiment with textures and finishes to achieve a natural, radiant appearance. 

This profile reflects an evolving beauty routine with a focus on practicality and performance across both makeup and body care.
